mapper.select: /* BoardMasterMapper.getBoardMasterList */ SELECT twbm.BOARD_CD, twbm.BOARD_NM, twbm.BOARD_FG, twbm.ANSWER_FG, twbm.AUTO_APPR_FG FROM TB_WB_BOARD_MASTER twbm WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY twbm.BOARD_CD
/* BoardMasterMapper.getBoardMasterBoardCd */ SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(twbm.BOARD_CD), 0) + 1, 2, '0') FROM TB_WB_BOARD_MASTER twbm WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: /* BoardMasterMapper.getBoardMasterSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_BOARD_MASTER ( BOARD_CD, BOARD_NM, BOARD_FG, ANSWER_FG, AUTO_APPR_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{boardCd}, #{boardNm}, #{boardFg}, #{answerFg}, #{autoApprFg}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, 'Y' )
mapper.update: /* BoardMasterMapper.getBoardMasterSaveUpdate */ UPDATE TB_WB_BOARD_MASTER SET BOARD_NM = #{boardNm}, BOARD_FG = #{boardFg}, ANSWER_FG = #{answerFg}, AUTO_APPR_FG = #{autoApprFg}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_CD = #{boardCd}
